divs: Sighting DetailsHi, This event happened in Mysore, Karnataka, India. I was walking with 2 other friends of mine, when suddenly i looked up in the sky, because some few more people were looking in that direction in the sky. What we saw was very strange. Some 12-15, star like, extremely small, just like stars, but were RED in color, were moving in the sky as a group. They were moving quite slowly, not ver fast. Their movement can be described in the following manner- : 2 in the front, then, some gap followed by 1, then gap followed by 3 more and so on. But they all were moving in 1 direction and there were around 15 of them. All were red in color. We tried making a video of it but could not. Then after sighting them for a minute or so, since it was very cloudy here, they went behind the clouds one by one and then we did not see them again.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mysuru
There were no other sightings in Mysuru on or around October 28th 2010
Summary: Star shaped, red colored, 12-15 in number moving in a group.
